name: Doll House (Bored Leviathan)
description:
Doll House is a short 3D horror game.

STORY

You're invited by your friends to explore an abandoned house in the middle of the forest, but things are not going as smoothly as you thought..

CONTROLS

MOUSE Look W A S D Move E Interact F Flashlight CTRLCrouchSHIFTRunESCPause / Items & Notes

NOTE

  • Encounter any bugs or bad grammar ? feel free to comments!
  • Sorry for my bad english.

UNINSTALL

  • Delete the game folder.
